title: Accepting the Moon
description: There is a new Alpha Wolf in town, and she is about to change everything.Mena had all she wanted in life: a nice house, money, a successful husband who treated her like a queen.That was, until she found out her marriage was all a lie, and things she never thought could exist, did.Vampires are real.Werewolves are real.And Mena is not human anymore.
author: K.S. Haigwood
